td.content: s:female writer aged 49 yrs says she is having symptoms of Kidney 18-19 times a week, mostly during the day. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol denies any smoking o:Height 154 cm, Weight 45.1 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, Abdominal CT Scan shows smaller than normal kidneys a:Chronic Renal Failure p:administered Irbesartan - 150 mg daily, performed Abdominal CT Scan, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a white F aged 50 years presents with 3 years history of Kidney. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 154 cm, Weight 44.8 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Abdominal CT Scan.
